title: Video & New: Onoe Caponoe – FunkadeliC PlaneT
content:
Brainchild and CitR fave, Onoe Caponoe, has followed up the release of his Willows Midnight Gallery LP with this playful new video for, FunkadeliC PlaneT.

Caponoe’s flow is as frustrated as ever, “Last night I stood up in my bed and watched my body sleep”, it’s this invigorated, static imagery that forces the young MC to an exciting little cubbyhole of UK hip-hip. Spaced beats, a funky bass-line and a spinning world that Caponoe expertly maneuvers form something we haven’t heard for a while in UK hip-hop.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
